title: Three Poems from Les Fleurs Du Mal
description: red cover; white label with title and author on cover; has red box case; illustrated with four photogravures \'Nude, Italy\', 1933 [woman in water], \'Mexico\', 1934 [couple in bed], \'Martine\'s Legs\', 1968 [woman\'s legs], and \'La Pause Entre Deux Poses de Dessin, Paris\', 1989 [two nude women]
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
